NK010(tha)036:0: h'u khrag 'thung pad+ma drag po yi //
NK010(tha)036:1: spyan sngar khas blangs dam bcas pa'i //
NK010(tha)036:2: gter srung bdud btsan klu gsum po //
NK010(tha)036:3: 'dir gshegs dam rdzas gtor ma bzhes //
NK010(tha)036:4: mi mthun rkyen bzlog dgra bgegs thul //
NK010(tha)036:5: bcol ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod //
NK010(tha)036:6: ma ra du shu la tsa n+aa ga phu sa pa ri w+aa ra ba ling+ta kh+aa hi //
